content: http://build.fhir.org/valueset-encounter-participant-type.html: This value set is the designated 'entire code system' value set for ParticipantType
Seems that the "summary" section has that 'entire code system' statement that does seem to be incorrect. But I have to assume that the CLD is correct. @Grahame Grieve agree?
I think we'll assume that committee means what it says there
this is a bit strange - and the "This value set is the designated 'entire code system' value set for ParticipantType" is indeed incorrect - so I'm not sure where this lands?
I'll have to sort it out during QA.
